name: Angelic: Equilateral
description:
This interactive fiction is a test I've written to familiarize myself with Twine.

The content of the fiction can be upsetting. It contains wax, insects, worms, body horror and death of children. Also the mention of citrus.

If you are ready, start playing and discover the question of the lilac child.

Currently the game only has chapter 1.

At end of each chapter, you may save the game.

Game confirmed to run in the newest version of chrome.

Game is made in Twine and in HTML.

Note: If a detail changes when you replay, don't doubt your memory: some details are random and may change when you load the page.
